doc: An OAuth2 provider's credentials for an ORCATECH user.
name: credential

fields.name: account
fields.doc: An OAuth2 provider that can be used for authentication

fields.name: createdBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who created the record

fields.name: updatedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who updated the record

fields.name: deletedBy
fields.doc: The com.orcatech.user.id for the user who deleted the record
